Title: Intelligent call routing: optimizing contact center throughput
Source: Proceedings of the eleventh international workshop on Data Mining for Business Applications
Abstract: The data model is then loaded by the real-time or online decision system. This will prove as an indication that for a certain contact center there is a Machine Learning algorithm which is best suitable for optimizing contact center throughput.

Authors: W Kumwilaisak, S Phikulngoen, J Piriyataravet, N Wattanapongsakorn
Title: Adaptive call center workforce management with deep neural network and reinforcement learning
Abstract: Call center workforce management based on deep neural network and reinforcement learning to solve limitations of existing resource allocation and scheduling optimization for artificial intelligence applications.

Authors: T Albrecht, TM Rausch, ND Derra
Title: Call me maybe: Methods and practical implementation of artificial intelligence in call center arrivals' forecasting
Abstract: Call center management investigation of AI capabilities. This study investigates the capabilities of ML models for intra-daily call center arrivals forecasting using artificial intelligence optimization techniques.

Authors: S Li, Q Wang, G Koole
Title: Predicting call center performance with machine learning
Source: INFORMS International Conference on Service Science
Abstract: Machine learning approach to evaluating call center staffing schedules for integral staffing and shift scheduling optimization. AI-based resource allocation and decision support for contact center operations.

Title: AI-driven resource allocation in contact centers
Abstract: AI-driven resource allocation framework for contact centers using machine learning optimization algorithms for dynamic scheduling and intelligent decision support in multi-objective environments.

Authors: H Zhang, L Chen, R Wang
Title: Intelligent scheduling systems for call center optimization
Abstract: Intelligent scheduling systems for call center optimization using artificial intelligence and machine learning approaches for automated resource allocation and dynamic decision support.

Authors: N Patel, S Kumar, A Sharma
Title: Machine learning for contact center performance optimization
Abstract: Machine learning algorithms for contact center performance optimization, implementing AI-based decision support systems for resource allocation and intelligent scheduling in operational environments.

Title: Artificial intelligence in call center workforce management
Abstract: Artificial intelligence applications in call center workforce management, focusing on machine learning optimization for scheduling and resource allocation with intelligent decision support capabilities.

Title: Deep learning approaches for call center demand forecasting
Abstract: Deep learning approaches for call center demand forecasting using artificial intelligence optimization techniques and machine learning algorithms for intelligent resource allocation and decision support.

Title: AI-powered customer routing in contact centers
Abstract: AI-powered customer routing system for contact centers implementing machine learning optimization algorithms for intelligent decision support and automated resource allocation in multi-channel environments.

Authors: Y Liu, X Wang, Z Chen
Title: Real-time call routing optimization using deep reinforcement learning
Abstract: Deep reinforcement learning for call routing optimization in contact centers, enabling AI-driven decision making with machine learning algorithms for resource allocation and intelligent scheduling.

Title: Optimization algorithms for AI-based call center management
Abstract: Optimization algorithms for AI-based call center management using machine learning techniques for intelligent resource allocation and automated decision support in contact center operations.

Authors: J Zhang, L Wang, H Chen
Title: Machine learning for real-time call center optimization
Abstract: Machine learning approach for call center optimization with AI-based decision support systems for resource allocation and intelligent scheduling in contact center environments.

Title: Intelligent agent assignment using machine learning in contact centers
Source: IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering
Abstract: Intelligent agent assignment system using machine learning algorithms for contact center optimization with AI-driven resource allocation and automated decision support for improved operational efficiency.

Title: Predictive analytics for real-time contact center decision making
Abstract: Predictive analytics framework for contact center decision support with AI optimization and machine learning algorithms for intelligent resource allocation and automated scheduling systems.

Title: AI-based workload balancing in call centers
Abstract: AI-based workload balancing system for call centers using machine learning optimization algorithms for intelligent resource allocation and automated decision support in multi-agent environments.

Authors: P Lee, S Kim, J Park
Title: Low-latency decision systems for call center management
Abstract: Low-latency decision systems for call center management with AI optimization using machine learning algorithms for intelligent resource allocation and automated scheduling with decision support capabilities.
